Description: Tray stand in brass with silver inlays; inscribed with the name and titles of Mamluk sultan Muhammad ibn Qalawun.
Curator's comments: The form and designs of the tray stand are echoed in 15th century Chinese porcelain. See for example 1966,1215.1
Bibliographic references: Akbarnia et al 2018 / The Islamic World: a History in Objects (p.148, fig.5)
Albukhary 2018 / The Making of the Albukhary Foundation Gallery of the Islamic World (p.28, fig.6)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2014 Sep-2015 Jan, BM WCEC, 'Ming: 50 years that changed China'
